definition: [Ribosomal protein S12]-L-aspartate + Sulfur donor + 2 S-Adenosyl-L-methionine <=> [Ribosomal protein S12]-3-methylthioaspartate + S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine + L-Methionine + 5'-Deoxyadenosine
name: [ribosomal protein S12]-L-aspartate:sulfur-donor,S-adenosyl-L-methionine C3-methylthiotransferase
